items.sentence: I\'ve been studying French since I was thirteen.
It\'s a good thing you know how to speak French.
It\'s a lot more fun than I thought it would be.

Do you want me to inform Tom about our decision?
Does it really matter which one of these I pick?
I\'m sure Tom didn\'t even notice you were late.
I\'ve always wanted to write a children\'s book.
I was born in the Boston and grew up in Chicago.
I was going to tell you, but Tom told me not to.
I was just about to go to bed when he phoned me.
I really wish I knew where Tom put my briefcase.
I remember hearing a very similar story to that.
I remember singing this song with you years ago.

I saw Tom a few minutes ago and he looked tired.
